title.oldValue: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
title.newValue: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files

description.oldValue: With this release, you will be able to OCR multi-page PDF and TIFF files in SharePoint and OneDrive.
description.newValue: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.
